conbody.p: The Thesaurus Navigator is located on the left of your workspace in the Thesaurus view. It includes key words that you can apply to the texts and objects metadata (passport data).
The toolbar of the Thesaurus navigator contains the following entries:
This adds a new "Thesaurus Root" which will appear at the bottom of the Thesaurus tree.
This adds a new child entry to a selected root entry or child entry.
Adds an annotation to the active thesaurus entry.
Adds an annotation to the active thesaurus entry.
This moves an entry from the Thesaurus to Bin.
Search the Thesaurus for entries.

Entries deleted in Thesaurus Navigator appear in "Bin" tab. They are listed individually. Deleting an item here will remove it permanently. Please note that generating the list of the objects in the Bin may take up to one minute the first time you click it after installing BTS. After this the preview works faster.
Drop-down menu ""
Offers all the options available in the Toolbar (see above) and more:
Delete selected entry completely.
Assign user roles for thesaurus entries.
Opens the history of the changes made for the selected lemma.
